en.hero_title: The Revolutionary App That Helps To Access Internet Securely
en.hero_subtitle: Welcome to FoxRay, your one-stop solution for unparalleled online privacy and freedom. With FoxRay, you can browse the web anonymously, unblock your favorite websites, and secure your data.
en.about_subtitle: Access geo-restricted content, websites, and apps from anywhere in the world. While protecting your identity and sensitive data from hackers and trackers.
en.feature1_desc: Servers everywhere! No matter where you are, we've got you covered for high-speed, secure browsing.
en.feature2_desc: Choose from a vast network of global VPN servers for a fast and reliable experience.
en.feature3_desc: Your online activities are secure with AES 256-bit encryption.
en.feature4_desc: Stream, download, and browse as much as you want with no limits.
en.feature5_desc: Get online privacy and security with just one tap.
en.feature6_desc: Available for Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac.
en.screenshot_title: User Friendly interface And Very Easy To Use VPN App
en.download_title: Download The Latest Version Of Our App
en.downloadSubtitle: Get our app from the official stores
en.contact_subtitle: You can contact us on Telegram! just click down belowğŸ‘‡
